question: What are some ways of thinking about the original phrasing of the 'longest common subsequence' problem that could be helpful to discovering its subproblems?

options.answer: The optimization required is to maximize some value
The optimization required is to minimize some value
Start by considering all the ways you can find common subsequences.
Start by considering all the ways you can find longest common subsequences.
Start by considering what will be the base case.
